txt.en: Defend Hrimbarg.
Talk to Thorgest

'Perhaps we should not have returned to Hrimbarg, my friend. Everything is the same as when I left for Elderslade. We should retire for the night and return to Gundabad in the morning.'

Thorgest starts to get ready for the night then pauses abruptly.

'Wait, what is that sound outside? Oh no, an assault has begun! We must hurry!'
Head to the Hrimbarg's courtyard!
'The fire by the northern entrance has gone out!'
The drake invasion has been defeated!
'The fire by the eastern entrance has gone out!'
Head to the Hrimbarg's courtyard!
'The fire by the southern entrance has gone out!'
Defend Hrimbarg
'I will guard Thorgest's Haven. We must protect Hrimbarg!'
Talk to Thorgest.
You have defended Hrimbarg!
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow the Dwarves of Hrimbarg to be defeated ([placeholder]/[placeholder])</rgb>
Drakes are attacking under cover of darkness!
A dwarf has succumbed to the attack!
You have been tasked with protecting the outpost of Hrimbarg in the Misty Mountains.
'Great work, [placeholder]! You saved Hrimbarg! We should return and report back in. Hmm, It is late though. Tomorrow we will return. I look forward to telling Afwald of this adventure!'
Mission: Darkness in the Mist
Defeat the drake invasion
